name: Swimming In The Lake
description:
(Tw : underwater stuff)

🦞 Swimming In The Lake 🐟

Dad always said to be careful, but at this point, we had stopped listening to him. 

🌊🌊🌊

Use space to shoot and the arrows to move, and try to escape the eel and other fishy monsters.  (Please tell me your best score below, mine is 20 145)

This little gaming experiment was made for the fourth round of GDKO2023. It is the second installement of a series of games revolving around a small vacation town. This time the inspiration was this poem by Margaret Atwood (I changed the text a bit), this collection of picture from Flickr The Commons and the genuine fear I felt the first time I played centipede arcade. 

  • Music : the Immortal Hurt, To Bed, and Konjunktionsbeseitigung  by criptic scenery 
  • Sounds are all from Zapsplat 
  • Font is by me 

You can follow me on twitter if you want more news about this game or other !

As always thank you Bogy for being my gamer consultant and for playing again and again at this game.
